author: Anonymous Scale
title: Help desk dead end page
question:
Does anyone else have this problem with help desk where it takes you to an empty page with blue text "please go here" only nothing happens when you click it?
Ive tried copy pasting the link as well into different tabs or browsers with no luck, only an empty page saying "there is nothing here".
Has anyone else had this problem?
instructor_answer:
With apologies to the Dr Racket team, I don't use the help desk.  I find it often has install problems.
If I want to look up rectangle, I type  "racket beginning student xxx", and then I make sure to choose one of:
     Beginning Student Language
     images.rkt
     universe.rkt
from the choices it offers me.
